online.name: Name
online.teamStehtIhnenZurVerfuegung: Our team is always available for your questions. We have summarized the most frequently asked questions and answers here:

faqs.question: What leads do we offer?
faqs.answer: Currently, we can offer you leads for photovoltaic systems (private and commercial). We distinguish between exclusive and multi-leads.

faqs.question: How quickly will I receive the leads?
faqs.answer: Depending on the type of contract, you can receive the leads within 1 to 24 hours.

faqs.question: How are the leads transmitted?
faqs.answer: We transmit the leads directly to your CRM or provide the data via an Excel list.

faqs.question: Is there a minimum purchase?
faqs.answer: Yes, depending on the contract, there is a minimum purchase of leads. You will receive this information upon inquiry.

faqs.question: How much do the leads cost?
faqs.answer: The costs for the leads vary depending on the type of leads and region. You will receive more precise information upon inquiry.

faqs.question: Are the leads GDPR compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes, all leads are GDPR compliant as we use legally verified funnels.

testimonials.name: Maurice
testimonials.text: With Energieleads, we were able to create a new website, build funnels, and have even taken on several hundred leads! High six-figure revenue was achieved. Thank you!
